      Takes the setMode(String) from the request.

    • Field Detail

      • MODE_REQUEST

        public static final String MODE_REQUEST
        Takes the setMode(String) from the request.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARAM_DEBUG_LOG_IN_PAGE

        protected static final String PARAM_DEBUG_LOG_IN_PAGE
        Parameter which switches a session to put HTML comments what was included into the page, but only if logger "com.composum.pages.commons.taglib.IncludeTag-inpage" is at debug. Look for <!-- cpp:include begin and <!-- cpp:include end .
        See Also:
        debugComment(boolean), Constant Field Values

      • LOGINPAGE

        protected static final org.slf4j.Logger LOGINPAGE
        Logger "com.composum.pages.commons.taglib.IncludeTag-inpage" that acts as switch that debugComment(boolean) inserts HTML-comments into the output that shows what exactly was included.
